definitions.text: a mixture of wet clay and sand that can be used to line a pond and that is impervious to water when dry
a small body of standing water (rainwater) or other liquid
examples: there were puddles of muddy water in the road after the rain
the body lay in a pool of blood

definitions.text: something resembling a pool of liquid
examples: he stood in a pool of light
his chair sat in a puddle of books and magazines

definitions.text: wade or dabble in a puddle
examples: The ducks and geese puddled in the backyard

definitions.text: subject to puddling or form by puddling
work a wet mixture, such as concrete or mud
mess around, as in a liquid or paste
examples: The children are having fun puddling in paint

definitions.text: make a puddle by splashing water

examples: Again, the cat had made on the expensive rug
